snippet: Obama needs to use the purchasing power of the government to force manufacturers to change the way their products are distributed and made.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Reverends David K Brawley, Otis Moss III, David Benke and Joel Mosbacher scores Pres Obama for his failure to use the most powerful tool he has in fight against guns in America--government's purchasing power; argues government itself is the largest buyer of firearms and ammunition sold legally in the United States, and urges Obama to use that leverage to force gun manufacturers into helping to protect the public from illegal gun distribution.

byline.original: By DAVID K. BRAWLEY, OTIS MOSS III, DAVID BENKE and JOEL MOSBACHER

lead_paragraph: Obama needs to use the purchasing power of the government to force manufacturers to change the way their products are distributed and made.

headline.main: Here’s a Way to Control Guns
